import React from 'react'; import {Form,Col,Button,Accordion,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import './Prenota.css' import {Reirect} from "react-router-dom"; class Prenota extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { dati_casa: this.props.history.location.state.dati_casa ? this.props.history.location.state.dati_casa : [], checkIn: this.props.history.location.state.checkIn ? this.props.history.location.state.checkIn : '', checkOut: this.props.history.location.state.checkOut ? this.props.history.location.state.checkOut : '', posti: this.props.history.location.state.posti ? this.props.history.location.state.posti : 1, partenza: '', ritorno: '' } } componentDidMount() { var str1 = this.state.checkIn; var dmy1 = str1.split("/"); var str2 = this.state.checkOut; var dmy2 = str2.split("/"); this.setState({ partenza: new Date(dmy1[2], dmy1[1] - 1, dmy1[0]).toISOString().slice(0,10), ritorno: new Date(dmy2[2], dmy2[1] - 1, dmy2[0]).toISOString().slice(0,10) }); var partenza = new Date(dmy1[2], dmy1[1] - 1, dmy1[0]) const offset = partenza.getTimezoneOffset() partenza = new Date(partenza.getTime() - (offset*60*1000)) console.log(partenza.toISOString()); } render(){ return(
